entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Following a long and twisting trail you have finally gotten the droid together. Inside was information that your handler found quite interesting. You have been told to go to  Naboo to continue the chase.
entries.journal_entry_description: You have the head from EV-9D9. Watto has the other parts that you found. Go back to Watto and put the droid back together.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go back to Watto and get all of the pieces that you recovered.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Take the parts you got from Watto and attach them to the head (drag the legs, body, and utility modules, onto the Head part). After you finish, talk to Watto.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Assemble the Droid and Talk to Watto.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The droid's power pack is dead. Give the droid to Watto and he will recharge it.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Check to see if Watto has the battery on the Droid recharged.
